quoteEN: When we love, we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
quoteES: Cuando amamos, siempre nos esforzamos por ser mejores de lo que somos. Cuando nos esforzamos por ser mejores de lo que somos, todo lo que nos rodea también mejora.
author: ❤Paulo Coelho, -El alquimista- ❤

quoteEN: To feel the love of people whom we love is a fire that feeds our life.
quoteES: Sentir el amor de las personas que amamos es un fuego que alimenta nuestra vida.
author: ❤Pablo Neruda❤

quoteEN: Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary.
quoteES: Nunca ames a nadie que te trate como si fueras ordinario.
author: ❤Oscar Wilde❤

quoteEN: Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence.
quoteES: A veces es una forma de amor solo para hablar con alguien con quien no tienes nada en común y aún estar fascinado por su presencia.
author: ❤David Byrne❤

quoteEN: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
quoteES: Tu tarea no es buscar el amor, sino simplemente buscar y encontrar todas las barreras dentro de ti que has construido contra él.
author: ❤Rumi❤

quoteEN: When you love someone, you love the person as they are, and not as you'd like them to be.
quoteES: Cuando amas a alguien, amas a la persona tal como es, y no como te gustaría que fuera.
author: ❤Leo Tolstoy❤

quoteEN: When I saw you I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew.
quoteES: Cuando te vi me enamoré y sonreíste porque lo sabías.
author: ❤Arrigo Boito❤

quoteEN: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quoteES: La mayor felicidad de la vida es la convicción de que somos amados; amado por nosotros mismos, o mejor dicho, amado a pesar de nosotros mismos.
author: ❤Victor Hugo❤

quoteEN: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is to love and be loved in return.
quoteES: Lo mejor que aprenderás es amar y ser amado a cambio.
author: ❤Nat King Cole❤

quoteEN: You are my sun, my moon, and all my stars.
quoteES: Eres mi sol, mi luna y todas mis estrellas.
author: ❤E. E. Cummings❤

quoteEN: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
quoteES: No amas a alguien porque son perfectos, los amas a pesar de que no lo son.
author: ❤Jodi Picoult, My Sister's Keeper ❤

quoteEN: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quoteES: De lo que estén hechas nuestras almas, las suyas y las mías son iguales.
author: ❤Emily Brontë ❤

quoteEN: Oh, how a quiet love can drown out every fear.
quoteES: Oh, cómo un amor tranquilo puede ahogar cada miedo.
author: ❤Jessica Katoff❤

quoteEN: I have decided to stick to love; hate is too great a burden to bear.
quoteES: He decidido apegarme al amor; El odio es una carga demasiado grande para soportar.
author: ❤Martin Luther King, Jr.❤

quoteEN: I’ve tried so many times to think of a new way to say it, and it’s still I love you.
quoteES: He intentado tantas veces pensar en una nueva forma de decirlo, y todavía te amo.
author: ❤Zelda Fitzgerald❤

quoteEN: In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love
quoteES: En vano he luchado. No va a hacer Mis sentimientos no serán reprimidos. Debes permitirme decirte cuán ardientemente admiro y amo
author: ❤Sr. Darcy, 'Orgullo y prejuicio'❤
